Class TColoredBlock

java.lang.Object
  Thing
      TGridded
          TColoredBlock
Direct Known Subclasses:
GroundHole
public class TColoredBlock
extends TGridded

Represents a Gridded Thing that has Color. It can either be a corner piece, a side piece or a middle piece.

Author:
rweichler
